column5: Does anybody know if the "Patricia Inn and Family Restaurant" has the night life it used to? I know we used to have a really good time there during our trip out of the bush, then one year they closed..... Any help?
as far as i know the bar is not open. the restaurant is still operating and serving one of the best burgers in the northwest.(my opinion only)
PI is still open in dryden and the bar has reopened .... the night life is not quite the same (more clothes involved )
C'mon now --- You have to give us more details then that !!
If it wasn't broken, why fix it? I think it was just "FINE" the way it was!
